title: Fawad criticises Atta Tarar for attacking police
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Sunday criticised Pakistan Muslim League Nawaz (PML-N) leader Atta Tarar for attacking the police in Gujranwala.
In a tweet, the minister said Atta Tarar should be conveyed not to become McMohan all the time.
Hopefully, the minister said, Atta would become a good kid after serving three years in jail.
